sentence.Network_en: In midsummer every town is impossibly crowded.
sentence.Network_cn: 仲夏时节，每个城市都出奇地拥挤。

sentence.Network_en: Mathematical physics is an almost impossibly difficult subject.
sentence.Network_cn: 数学物理是一门难得超乎想象的学科。

sentence.Network_en: He would allow John slyly to copy his answers to impossibly difficult algebra questions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他会让约翰偷偷抄下自己对一些极难的代数题的解答.

惊天巨啸(The impossible),不错的片子；母侵(MAMA),片子一般，纸套出色，封面及中脊处的片名都是凹字，局部银卡的设计锦上添花…

entry.def: Something that is impossible cannot be done or cannot happen.

example.ex: It was impossible for anyone to get in because no one knew the password...
example.tran: 因为没人知道密码,所以任何人都不可能进得去。

example.ex: He thinks the tax is impossible to administer...

entry.def: An impossible situation or an impossible position is one that is very difficult to deal with.

example.ex: The Government was now in an almost impossible position.
example.tran: 政府现在几乎陷入了进退维谷的境地。

entry.tran: 难以忍受的;让人受不了的
entry.def: If you describe someone as impossible, you are annoyed that their bad behaviour or strong views make them difficult to deal with.

example.ex: The woman is impossible, thought Frannie.
example.tran: 弗兰妮想,这个女人真让人受不了。

means.word_mean: 1. in a manner or to a degree not possible of conceiving;
2. to a degree impossible of achievement;

sentences.sentence: "long thought to be an impossibly difficult operation"

auth_sentence.content: Whatever, it features an impossibly fly bass solo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whatever, it features an impossibly fly bass solo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whatever, it features an impossibly fly bass solo.

auth_sentence.content: It is impossibly complicated and too easy to avoid.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is impossibly complicated and too easy to avoid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is impossibly complicated and too easy to avoid.

auth_sentence.content: Watched Santo Domingo race past and felt impossibly alone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Watched Santo Domingo race past and felt impossibly alone.
